ygData.subject: Re: completly OOC

(That's all nice, but DO NOT advertise other RPGs in the place where the RPG 
happens.  It's a waste of time.  Advertise it on the message board and/or 
chat room.  But NOT on Egroups.  Understand?  Whoever started this just 
probably generated more OOC crap that has nothing to do with this RPG)
